downloadTitle: Improving Business Process Management Using Visio 2010
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how customer uses Visio 2010 to improve business process management.

downloadFile.name: Improving Business Process Management using Visio 2010.docx

detailsSection: Northwind Traders is a distributor of fine grocery products and serves over 200 high-end grocery store customers along the west coast of the United States.  Northwind’s sales revenue exceeded $20 million in 200X, a 10% increase over the previous year. However, due to competitive price pressures and operational inefficiencies, net income only increased by 2%.   Download this white paper to find out how the company improves business process management using Visio 2010.
detailsSection_file_name: Improving Business Process Management using Visio 2010.docx
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button (above) to download the white paper.
